Name: }tp_set_access_to_cubes
DataProcedure:

vReturnValue = ExecuteProcess(cControlPrefix | 'tp_set_access_to_cube', 
'pExecutionId', pExecutionId, 
'pCube', varCube,
'pRight', varRight,
'pSourceFile', pSecondSourceFile,
'pControl', pControl);
If (vReturnValue <> ProcessExitNormal());
ProcessError;
EndIf;
